name: Hyatt Regency Riyadh Olaya
description: {'Location': ['Hyatt Regency Riyadh Olaya is located on Olaya Road in the Al Olaya district of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The hotel is adjacent to Tahlia Street, known for its array of restaurants and major shops, and is close to commercial and retail districts such as the financial district and Riyadh International Convention & Exhibition Center.'], 'Services and Facilities': ["Wellness: Sokoun Spa offers four treatment rooms, a traditional Moroccan Hammam, relaxation massages, and therapeutic body treatments. The wellness facilities also include an indoor swimming pool, a multi-purpose court, and a Camp Hyatt kids' club.", 'Business Amenities: The hotel provides over 10,700 square feet (1,000 square meters) of conference and banquet facilities, including the Al Loulou’a Ballroom, which can be divided into three separate rooms and seat up to 500 people theater-style. There are nine flexible event venues suitable for various events such as weddings, social banquets, exhibitions, meetings, and conferences.', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, 24-hour room service, concierge assistance, airport transportation, valet parking, and a barber shop are available for guests.', 'Dining: The hotel features multiple dining options:', 'Fifty Sixth Avenue Diner: Offers American comfort food and traditional favorites from various regions of the United States.', 'Azure: Serves specialty dishes from the gastronomic heritage of countries bordering the Aegean Sea, including Greece and Turkey.'], 'Rooms': ['Hyatt Regency Riyadh Olaya offers 261 luxurious guestrooms, including 40 suites, spread across 28 floors. All rooms feature panoramic city views and incorporate subtle local design elements.', 'Accommodations range from standard rooms with king or twin beds to spacious suites, all equipped with modern amenities such as flat-screen TVs, seating areas, work desks, tea and coffee-making facilities, and private bathrooms with complimentary toiletries.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Kingdom Centre Tower: Approximately 1.3 km away, this iconic skyscraper features an observation deck with panoramic city views.', 'Centria Mall: Located about 0.3 km away, providing a variety of luxury retail stores and dining options.', 'Riyadh Gallery Mall: A popular shopping destination located about 7 km away.', "National Museum of Saudi Arabia: Situated roughly 8 km from the hotel, showcasing the country's history and culture."]}
short_description: A 5-star hotel in Riyadh's Al Olaya district, offering luxurious accommodations, diverse dining options, and comprehensive wellness facilities.

name: Narcissus The Royal Hotel
description: {'Location': ["Narcissus The Royal Hotel is situated on Olaya Street in the Al Olaya district of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. This central location places guests within walking distance of Al Faisaliah Mall and Tower, and provides easy access to the city's financial district."], 'Services and Facilities': ['Dining: The hotel features multiple dining options, including:', 'Where East Meets West: An international buffet with live cooking stations.', 'Pampa Grill: An outdoor Argentinean cuisine experience.', 'The Cove: A seafood restaurant.', 'Magnolia Lounge: A casual setting for cocktails and light fare.', 'Wellness: Guests can enjoy the Elite Spa, which offers private areas for male and female guests, an indoor swimming pool, sauna, steam rooms, and a well-equipped fitness center.', 'Business Amenities: The hotel provides two function rooms and five boardrooms, complemented by experienced planning and catering staff, making it suitable for business events and social gatherings.', 'Additional Services: Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, 24-hour room service, concierge assistance, and free private parking are available for guests.'], 'Rooms': ['Narcissus The Royal Hotel offers 280 luxurious rooms and suites, blending classic elegance with contemporary comfort.', 'Accommodations range from Deluxe Rooms to the opulent Royal Suite, which spans 353 square meters and includes two master bedrooms, a salon with a piano, a royal dining room with a kitchenette, a private gym room, and more.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Al Faisaliah Mall and Tower: Approximately 600 meters away, offering shopping, dining, and panoramic city views.', 'Kingdom Centre Tower: About 1.5 kilometers from the hotel, featuring an observation deck and upscale shopping.', 'Panorama Mall: Located approximately 2.8 kilometers away, offering a diverse range of retail stores and entertainment choices.']}
short_description: A 5-star hotel in Riyadh's Al Olaya district, offering luxurious accommodations, diverse dining options, and comprehensive wellness facilities.

name: KAYZŌ Restaurant
description: {'Information': ['KAYZŌ is a contemporary Japanese-inspired restaurant located in the As Sulimaniyah district of Riyadh. It offers a fusion of traditional Japanese flavors with modern culinary techniques, providing a sophisticated yet casual dining experience.', 'The name "KAYZŌ" is derived from Japanese words meaning "volcano" and "ocean," reflecting its dynamic menu that bridges Eastern and Western culinary traditions.'], 'Restaurant Features': ['Modern Ambiance: KAYZŌ boasts a stylish interior with contemporary décor, creating a welcoming atmosphere suitable for both casual outings and special occasions.', 'Open Kitchen Concept: Diners can observe chefs preparing dishes, enhancing the interactive dining experience.', 'Family-Friendly Environment: The restaurant offers a comfortable setting suitable for family gatherings.'], 'Main Dishes': ['Popcorn Shrimp: Crispy shrimp served with a creamy spicy sauce.', 'Chicken Gyoza: Pan-fried dumplings filled with seasoned chicken, accompanied by chili garlic layu sauce.', 'Spicy Salmon Maki: Salmon rolls enhanced with citrus amarillo, sweet soy, and spicy mayo.', 'Black Pepper Beef Noodles: Homemade noodles tossed with sautéed beef, mushrooms, and black pepper sauce.'], 'Working Hours': ['Saturday to Wednesday: 1:00 PM – 12:00 AM\u200b.', 'Thursday and Friday: 1:00 PM – 1:00 AM\u200b.'], 'Contact Information': ['Phone: +966-920014156']}
short_description: KAYZŌ Restaurant in Riyadh offers a modern Japanese dining experience, blending traditional flavors with contemporary techniques in a stylish and welcoming setting.

name: Assaraya Turkish Restaurant
description: {'Information': ['Assaraya Turkish Restaurant is a popular dining destination in Riyadh, renowned for its authentic Turkish cuisine and inviting atmosphere.', 'The restaurant spans three floors, each adorned with traditional Turkish decor, including ornate lamps and intricate ornaments.'], 'Restaurant Features': ['Authentic Turkish Cuisine: Assaraya offers a diverse menu of traditional Turkish dishes, prepared using time-honored recipes and high-quality ingredients.', 'Family-Friendly Environment: The spacious seating arrangements and warm ambiance make it ideal for family gatherings and group dining.', 'Tea Garden: The second-floor Tea Garden provides a tranquil space to enjoy beverages and desserts, enhancing the overall dining experience.'], 'Main Dishes': ['Mixed Grills: A selection of perfectly grilled meats, including kebabs and lamb chops, known for their tenderness and rich flavor.', 'Shawarma: Flavorful and juicy, available in both chicken and beef options.', 'Mezze Appetizers: An array of traditional starters such as hummus, baba ghanoush, and stuffed grape leaves.', 'Claypot Dishes: Slow-cooked meals that highlight the depth of Turkish culinary traditions.'], 'Working Hours': ['Daily: 10:30 AM – 2:00 AM.']}
short_description: Assaraya Turkish Restaurant in Riyadh offers authentic Turkish cuisine in a family-friendly setting, featuring traditional decor and a diverse menu of flavorful dishes.

name: Molo Restaurant
description: {'Information': ['Molo Restaurant is a contemporary Indian fusion eatery in Riyadh, offering a reimagined dining experience that blends traditional Indian flavors with modern culinary techniques.'], 'Restaurant Features': ['Innovative Indian Fusion Cuisine: Molo presents a unique menu that fuses classic Indian dishes with contemporary twists, providing guests with a novel culinary journey.', 'Elegant Ambiance: The restaurant boasts a stylish and inviting atmosphere, making it suitable for both casual dining and special occasions.', 'Open Kitchen Concept: Diners can observe the chefs at work, enhancing the interactive dining experience.'], 'Main Dishes': ['Molo Salad: A blend of green apples, kale, quinoa seeds, fresh dates, and broad beans, topped with chaat masala tahini dressing.', 'Special Butter Chicken: Tender chicken cooked in a rich, creamy tomato sauce with butter.', 'Chicken 65: Spicy, deep-fried chicken tossed in Indian spices and served on a banana leaf.', 'Hyderabadi Dum Biryani: Marinated lamb cooked with long-grain basmati rice, infused with aromatic flavors.'], 'Working Hours': ['Roshn Front Branch: Daily from 12:30 PM to 12:30 AM.', '60 Avenue Branch: Sunday to Wednesday: 1:00 PM – 12:15 AM; Thursday to Saturday: 1:00 PM – 1:00 AM.']}
short_description: Molo Restaurant in Riyadh offers innovative Indian fusion cuisine in a stylish setting, reimagining traditional flavors for a unique dining experience.

name: Karachi Grill Restaurant
description: {'Information:': ['Karachi Grill is a distinctive destination for lovers of Pakistani and Indian cuisine, offering a wide selection of traditional dishes with authentic flavors.'], 'Restaurant features:': ['Comfortable family atmosphere', 'A diverse menu featuring grilled items and spicy dishes.', 'Delivery service available.'], 'Main courses:': ['Chicken and meat biryani', 'Tikka Masala', 'Grilled Pakistani kebab'], 'Working hours:': ['Daily from 12:00 PM to 12:00 AM.']}
short_description: Karachi Grill Restaurant offers the most delicious Pakistani and Indian cuisine with an authentic touch and a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Trove
description: {'Information:': ['Trove is a luxury restaurant located in Dubai Mall, characterized by its modern atmosphere and offering a fine dining experience with luxurious shisha sessions.'], 'Restaurant features:': ['Upscale ambiance and a stunning view.', 'Distinct shisha sessions', 'A diverse menu featuring international cuisine', 'Elegant decor inspired by modern style.'], 'Main courses:': ['Grilled meat slices', 'Fresh seafood', 'Sushi and Asian dishes', 'Luxurious sweets'], 'working hours:': ['It works daily from 10:00 am until 2:00 am.']}

name: Al Falamanki Dubai
description: {'Information:': ['Al Falamanki is a Lebanese restaurant that serves traditional dishes in a warm, oriental atmosphere inspired by old Beirut.'], 'Restaurant Features:': ['Comfortable indoor and outdoor seating', 'Oriental atmosphere with antique decor', 'Offering shisha in its various types'], 'Main courses:': ['Lebanese Manakish', 'Mixed grill', 'Fattoush and Tabbouleh', 'Hummus with meat and pine nuts'], 'Working hours:': ['It opens daily from 8:00 am until 2:00 am.']}

name: Khobzah W Fakhaara
description: {'Information:': ['A restaurant serving traditional Arabic dishes with a modern twist, specializing in grilled and clay pot cooked meals.'], 'Restaurant Features:': ['Authentic Arab atmosphere', 'Using pottery in cooking to impart a distinctive flavor.', 'Comfortable indoor and outdoor seating'], 'Main courses:': ['Meat tagine in pottery', 'Mixed grill', 'Chicken and meat mandi', 'Vegetable stew in earthenware pot'], 'Working hours:': ['Daily from 12:00 noon until 11:00 pm']}

name: P.F. Chang's
description: {'Information:': ["P.F. Chang's is a global American restaurant chain specializing in Asian cuisine, particularly Chinese food with a modern twist, and is known for its comfortable atmosphere and distinctive dishes."], 'Restaurant features:': ['Modern atmosphere inspired by Asian culture.', 'A diverse menu featuring Chinese and Thai flavors.', 'Fast service and attention to the quality of components.'], 'Main courses:': ['Famous orange chicken.', 'Mongolian beef.', 'Dynamite Shrimp (Spicy Shrimp).', 'Noodles and Asian pasta in a variety of flavors.'], 'Working hours:': ['Daily from 11:00 am to 12:00 midnight.']}
